Schedule 40 PVC Reducing Tee - Soc x Fipt
Check Out Our PVC Pipe Size Guide Here

This model 402-211 measures 1-1/2" x 1-1/2" x 1" and has a Schedule 40 wall thickness. Strong PVC material. Reducer style tee with one threaded end. Get your 1.5 inch and 1 inch pipe at the same time and have it all shipped to you directly. Simple, fast, and cost effective.

Description
Details
This model 402-211 measures 1-1/2" x 1-1/2" x 1" and has a Schedule 40 wall thickness. Strong PVC material. Reducer style tee with one threaded end. Get your 1.5 inch and 1 inch pipe at the same time and have it all shipped to you directly. Simple, fast, and cost effective.
